author: Legoman1993
title: Coolest Xpod!
review: Im not really into X pod or creater sets until I saw this one.So I got this set and when i finshed building it I was impressed.The main model is cool and I like how the robot moves.I think this set was worth buying!

author: Imperial13
title: The Best X-POD EVER!
review: The robo pod is one of the only pods that actually appealed to me.The robot with lasers, and you can pretty much build anything from the X-Pod theme, like i've probably made about 10 different models using this set. It also comes with the ever usefull pod storage.  IT COMES WITH CHROME!

author: deluckybrick
title: Nice Pieces, nice robots
review:
I got this set in the mail from my Brickmaster subscription, and it still is one of the better ones.  I own no other X-pods, but this one is pretty sufficient.  I like the pod design, and how it is incorporated into one of the designs.  I also like the trans-blue elements, and the chrome ones.  This set goes well with the robobots set and the little robots set.  Very good set overall.

7/10

author: vezon8764
title: KOOL X-POD ROBO SET!
review:
I was a large X-Pod collector, as it started with the red pod, and unfortunately, ended with the 2007 robo pod. By that time, my X-Pods had almost completely merged with my other pieces, and so I lost interest in X-Pods. This, however, was one of my favorites, as it includes one of the last "rolling pod" instructions. With a few silver pieces and lots of dark blue clear pieces, including a lot of white, added with the size of an X-Pod, equals a lot of fun, that can fit inside your pocket!
Pros:
3 models
cool robot
half posable
rare pieces
Cons:
half posable
limited piece combinations
Get it if you want to finish your X-Pod collection, but I would suggest the blue jet X-Pod for a starter set.

author: DrathMaul1997
title: Shiny!
review:
I'll just do some lil' old pros an' cons for this set :)
 

-Pros

  • -Lots of cool parts, Very good for MOCs
  • -Cheap price
  • -the 'pod' is good for storing things (not just lego)
  • -Show you how to make some rather cool things

-Cons

  • -Some of the models look rather strange...
  • -Nothing else that I can think of

author: BobaFett2
title: Awesome!
review: This set is awesome! It has a ton of great stuff and is very cheap. The set contains a lot of useful/rare parts, has great robot designs, good colors, and is cheap. I am short on time, so I won't list pros and cons-but I recommend this set to all, either for parts or playing.
